Summary: A triangle shaped object with lights on each point with no sound.
divs: Sighting DetailsA freind and i were traveling on us 221 in check'va going to a freinds house and we topped over a hill we saw a bright light and i just thought it was a plane or helicopter or somethin then as we got closer we realized it wasnt either one when we got to it i realized it was a triangle shaped object floating very very slowly not making any sound and had lights on each point.I pulled into a little store parking lot and got out and stood there watching it amazed by what i was seeing it,it was allmost surreal and my freind was telling me to get in and jet he didnt wanr any part of it but i was kind of mesmorized by it so after like 10 or 15 min i decided it was time to go.On our way back through about 20 to 30 min later there was no sign of it at all.Ive allways wondered what it was no one belived us when we told our store they just laughed and said we were high or something but i know what i saw nad i was dead sober.
